attributes.action: Sack priti patel and boris johnson over the illegal immigrants at dover
attributes.additional_details:
I would like  parliment to do it. There there is not enough houses for genuine uk citizens and ex servicemen. We have service men who fought for the country they should come first. The illegal immigrants are putting a strain on services and also get preferencial treatment before uk citezens which is wrong. 

France are helping them cross which is wrong as well. They say there coming from a war torn country and asking for asylum bur last time i checked france wasnt a worn torn country
attributes.background:
I would like parliment to either force priti patel and boris johnson to make amendments to uk law to be able to deport all illegal immigrants at dover.

Or for parliment to sack boris and priti and get someone in who will do the job properly.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552

Repatriate refugees when their country of origin is safe: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577739
